# Learn about API authentication here: /r/getting-started # Find your api_key here: /settings/api library(plotly) data <- list( list( x = c("giraffes", "orangutans", "monkeys"), y = c(20, 14, 23), type = "bar" ) ) response <- py$plotly(data, kwargs=list(filename="basic-bar", fileopt="overwrite")) url <- response$url
